Dracon made no gestures and remained blank in the face, almost to the point=
 of appearing to be sinister.

"If it's important...then let's go," he said=
, agreeing with Krhinos, "we should discuss this ordeal furthermore amongst=
 ourselves..."
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Nic 
  To: nbwrpg@ya=
hoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, June 05, 2003 10:26 PM
  Subject: Re: The =
new Contract


  Krhinos watched the lithe bot come close and sneaking past=
 the crowd.

  Krhinos: Rukus, right? Good then. I guess this is the whole =
of the
  crew. I'd tell you more about this mission, but not in here. Too m=
any
  ears and I don't trust about all of them. Suffice it to say, your
  p=
aycheck is sitting calmly on the mobile station and you are eligible
  to 3=
.75% of the profits we make on this operation. The number might
  seem low,=
 but wait for the real thing! Now come along and let's go
  somewhere more =
private.

  Ironically, he was saying this precise sentence in the precise =
place
  and to the precise poeple in which circumstances it seemed weird. I=
n
  fact, one of the pleasure bots was saying the same thing to a drunken
 =
 miner who was nearly passed out on the floor. Lucky for her, the guy
  had=
 already paid her, twice rather than once, drunk as he was.

  --- In nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com, "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
  > --Rukus--
  > 
  > Ruk=
us's caught Krhinos and Dracon being a conversation, and stands 
  > slowly=
 from his table, setting his drink aside, and brushing off the 
  > pleasur=
e bots which were starting to get on his nerves. He almost 
  > starts a fi=
ght with a drunken tech bot, but decides not to cause a 
  > notable distur=
bance, or ruckus, so early on the journey.
  > 
  > Sliding smoothly betwee=
n tables, he avoids a serving bot, and finds 
  > himself next to Dracon an=
d Krhinos with a shot of energin in his 
  > hands that he swiped unnoticea=
bly from the serving bot as he passed.
  > 
  > "Krhinos..." he says softly=
, then nods to Dracon. "I'm Rukus, check 
  > the roster, I signed on late.=
 When do we leave?"
  > 
  >

 posting for this yet, so i missed

n see)

yah,

e
